content: materials - 2 skeins of purl soho s mulberry merino 1 80% extra fine merino and 20% mulberry silk each skein is 247 yards/ 100 grams approximately 451 yards required of a sport weight 2 yarn we used the color dark loam - us 7 4 5 mm 24-inch circular needles 3 gauge - 20 stitches = 4 inches in stockinette stitch - 32 stitches = approximately 4 inches in mistake rib unstretched size - finished circumference approximately 18 inches unstretched - finished height 15 inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/mulberry-merino 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=969 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881
